name: Dungeon Heist
description:
This game was made for KiwiJam19

Escape the dungeon with the Eternal Flame Artifact!
Watch out though, it's unstable and is continuously shooting multiplying fire balls.

Gameplay

  • Run over the seals to break them and activate the portal
  • Escape to the portal before the flames get out of control!

Controls

  • Move with W,S,A,D or Up,Down,Left,Right
  • Aim the mouse pointer to target where the fireballs go
  • Mouse Click to Teleport to mouse location (Unlocked after first portal)
